thread.title: Arizona bans Uber's driverless car tests after accident

title: Arizona bans Uber's driverless car tests after accident
text:
Arizona bans Uber's driverless car tests after accident 12:30pm IST - 01:04 
The governor of Arizona on Monday suspended Uber's ability to test self-driving cars on public roads in the state following a fatal crash last week that killed a 49-year-old pedestrian. Ryan Brooks reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The governor of Arizona on Monday suspended Uber's ability to test self-driving cars on public roads in the state following a fatal crash last week that killed a 49-year-old pedestrian. Ryan Brooks reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pJYl4z
